user_description.ru: Она сквиртует тебе на лицо, на грудь, на тело.
user_description.en: She squirts on your face, chest, body.

ai_description.ru: Он принимает её сквирт на тело — лицо, грудь, живот.
ai_description.en: He receives her squirt on body — face, chest, stomach.

image_prompt: man lying back, liquid spraying onto his chest, woman above him squirting, bedroom setting

text.en: Take her squirt on your body?
